titleStmt.title: Praedictions Christian and political, in several remarkable expressions taken from the last words of some of those persons who dy'd on account of the late (pretended) Popish Plot, wherein they seem to fore-tell a clear discovery of their innocence, and of the perjury of their accusers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
